steps.label: Initialize Deck
steps.detail: Send a request to create a new deck with the necessary parameters.
steps.scenario: User sends a POST request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index} with valid deck data.

steps.label: Retrieve Slides
steps.detail: Fetch the slides associated with the specified deck ID.
steps.scenario: User sends a GET request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index}.

steps.label: Add Slide
steps.detail: Send a request to add a new slide to the specified deck.
steps.scenario: User sends a POST request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index} with valid slide data.

steps.label: Update Slide
steps.detail: Send a request to update an existing slide in the specified deck.
steps.scenario: User sends a PUT request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index} with updated slide data.

steps.label: Delete Slide
steps.detail: Send a request to delete a slide from the specified deck.
steps.scenario: User sends a DELETE request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index}.

steps.label: Confirm Changes
steps.detail: Verify that the changes made to the slides are reflected correctly.
steps.scenario: User sends a GET request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index} to confirm the updates.

edge_cases.label: Invalid Deck ID
edge_cases.detail: Attempt to access slides with an invalid deck ID.
edge_cases.scenario: User sends a GET request to /{invalid_deck_id}/slides/{index}.

edge_cases.label: Unauthorized Access
edge_cases.detail: Attempt to modify slides without proper authentication.
edge_cases.scenario: User sends a POST request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index} without valid credentials.

edge_cases.label: Invalid Slide Data
edge_cases.detail: Attempt to add a slide with missing or invalid data.
edge_cases.scenario: User sends a POST request to /{deck_id}/slides/{index} with incomplete slide data.
